snippet: The "Chosen One" banner has gone from the Stretford End. The team has been overhauled through three consecutive offseasons of lavish spending. Alex Ferguson's shadow no longer looms quite so large....

headline.main: Moyes Back at Old Trafford and Still Thinking: 'What If?'
headline.print_headline: Moyes Back at Old Trafford and Still Thinking: 'What If?'

lead_paragraph: The "Chosen One" banner has gone from the Stretford End. The team has been overhauled through three consecutive offseasons of lavish spending. Alex Ferguson's shadow no longer looms quite so large.

snippet: With Alexis Sanchez's cross floating into the penalty area behind him, Olivier Giroud only had one choice: A back-heeled overhead flick....

lead_paragraph: With Alexis Sanchez's cross floating into the penalty area behind him, Olivier Giroud only had one choice: A back-heeled overhead flick.

snippet: Arsenal's 14-match unbeaten Premier League run might have convinced manager Arsene Wenger that they had developed the resolve needed sustain a title challenge but there was little sign of that quality in Tuesday's 2-1 defeat at Everton....

headline.main: Arsenal Struggled to Deal With Everton's Physical Game-Wenger
headline.print_headline: Arsenal Struggled to Deal With Everton's Physical Game-Wenger

lead_paragraph: Arsenal's 14-match unbeaten Premier League run might have convinced manager Arsene Wenger that they had developed the resolve needed sustain a title challenge but there was little sign of that quality in Tuesday's 2-1 defeat at Everton.

snippet: West Bromwich Albion have made a bid to sign France midfielder Morgan Schneiderlin and Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho said on Friday he would let him leave for the right price....

headline.main: West Brom Bid for Schneiderlin, United Will Let Him Leave
headline.print_headline: West Brom Bid for Schneiderlin, United Will Let Him Leave

lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion have made a bid to sign France midfielder Morgan Schneiderlin and Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho said on Friday he would let him leave for the right price.

snippet: Southampton striker Charlie Austin is set to have an operation on a dislocated shoulder and will be sidelined for up to four months, manager Claude Puel said on Sunday....

headline.main: Southampton Striker Austin Out for Up to Four Months
headline.print_headline: Southampton Striker Austin Out for Up to Four Months

lead_paragraph: Southampton striker Charlie Austin is set to have an operation on a dislocated shoulder and will be sidelined for up to four months, manager Claude Puel said on Sunday.

snippet: Swansea City top scorer Andre Ayew has cast doubt over his future at the club but says he wants to remain in the Premier League....

headline.main: Ayew Swansea Future 'in Hands of Chairman'
headline.print_headline: Ayew Swansea Future 'in Hands of Chairman'

lead_paragraph: Swansea City top scorer Andre Ayew has cast doubt over his future at the club but says he wants to remain in the Premier League.

snippet: Bournemouth manager Eddie Howe is looking forward to Sunday's Premier League clash with Southampton and is confident his team can secure local bragging rights by sealing a second consecutive home win over their south coast rivals....

headline.main: Bournemouth's Howe Keen to Build Rivalry With Saints
headline.print_headline: Bournemouth's Howe Keen to Build Rivalry With Saints

lead_paragraph: Bournemouth manager Eddie Howe is looking forward to Sunday's Premier League clash with Southampton and is confident his team can secure local bragging rights by sealing a second consecutive home win over their south coast rivals.

snippet: Former Manchester United and Newcastle United winger Gabriel Obertan has joined Russian Premier League side Anzhi Makhachkala on a two-year contract, the club announced on Wednesday....

headline.main: Former Manchester United Winger Obertan Joins Russia's Anzhi
headline.print_headline: Former Manchester United Winger Obertan Joins Russia's Anzhi

lead_paragraph: Former Manchester United and Newcastle United winger Gabriel Obertan has joined Russian Premier League side Anzhi Makhachkala on a two-year contract, the club announced on Wednesday.

snippet: - Gareth Barry scored on his 600th Premier League appearance as Everton fought back on Saturday to beat Middlesbrough 3-1 and return to second in the Premier League, two points adrift of Manchester City....

headline.main: Barry Scores on 600th Appearance as Everton Beat Boro
headline.print_headline: Barry Scores on 600th Appearance as Everton Beat Boro

lead_paragraph: - Gareth Barry scored on his 600th Premier League appearance as Everton fought back on Saturday to beat Middlesbrough 3-1 and return to second in the Premier League, two points adrift of Manchester City.

snippet: Watford have signed striker Jerome Sinclair from Liverpool on a five-year contract, the Premier League clubs confirmed on Thursday....

headline.main: Sinclair Joins Watford From Liverpool on Five-Year Deal
headline.print_headline: Sinclair Joins Watford From Liverpool on Five-Year Deal

lead_paragraph: Watford have signed striker Jerome Sinclair from Liverpool on a five-year contract, the Premier League clubs confirmed on Thursday.
